description: This is the main application class for the Notes backend, serving as the entry point and configuring OpenAPI documentation with API metadata, contact info, and server details.

classes.name: NotesAppBackendApplication
classes.description: The main class annotated with SpringBootApplication and OpenAPIDefinition that serves as the entry point for the Notes application backend.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The application entry point that initializes and runs the Spring Boot application.
